rounds.text: 1 of 3 women who won the Pulitzer Prize for Drama in the 1980s
rounds.response: (1 of) Beth Henley (for Crimes of the Heart), Marsha Norman (for 'night, Mother) & Wendy Wasserstein (for The Heidi Chronicles)
